ygData.subject: Re: soulfire and twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that this great sword has been found, I really hope that something is done to fix the twinking so we don t see level 7 or 8 Paladins wielding this sword.
ygData.messageBody:
Now that this great sword has been found, I really hope that something is
done to fix the twinking so we don't see level 7 or 8 Paladins wielding this
sword. I see its No Drop, but what is someone preventing someone else from
fighting the SK and Lucan and giving the quest components to a very low
level charactor.

Already its a shock to see very very low charactors to be wearing full
bronze and all the great magic items and weapons.

Aban Steelsoul
Rathe Server
-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 12:37 PM
To: 'EQ-Quest@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQ-Quest] soulfire


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

looks like the quest to get the paladin only holy sword soulfire has been
completed. if anyone knows about it, please post it here with spoiler
warnings or email me directly. my sister Erisi would love to get it soon.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
